text: â€œMoi jani ase tumikhan laga kaam aru dukh kori thaka to aru tumikhan dhorjo kori kene dukh uthai thaka to, aru manu pora biya kaam kori thaka tumikhan bhal napai. Tumikhan bhal pora jani loise kun manu taikhan to apostle khan ase koi kene tumi usorte ahe, kintu taikhan nohoi, aru taikhan misa koi ase koi kene tumi jani loi.
